unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhojem electricity bill hea mhoinyant 2500 rupiya dakhoita asa! Fattlea mhoinyant fokot Rs. 1800 aslem. Mhaka dista AC-k dosh divcho poddtolo, kiteak tor lagim lagim 24/7 to cholta hea ushnek lagun. Bijli consumption 30% voir gelya meter reading pormonnem. Polleunk zai asa kiteim leak vagera asa mhunn, na zalear mhojem pocket rit ravtelem dusrea bill cycle-ak!
normalised: arre yaar, mhojem current-achem bill hea mhoineak don hazar panchxem rupiya dakhoita asa! fattla mhoineak fokot rupiya ek hazar aatthxem aslem. mhaka dista A-C-ak dosh divcho poddta, kiteak hem goromichem zom'mor choltanach thodoch paus divasanak tevhi choloi mhunn. bijli vapornnem tis ttonke vaddla meter vachneachea pormonnem. polleunk zai khuim tori gallotta ki kainch, na zalear mhaji jeb fattla bill yeunach poryanth rekami zateli!
